headline: Kevin McCarthy says Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff will be removed from House Intelligence Committee if GOP wins majority in midterms
author: Yelena Dzhanova
sentences: Schiff served largely as the ranking member of the powerful committee, which oversees the nation's intelligence agencies, during the Trump administration, where he was a vocal critic of the former Republican president and pressed for inquiries into the Trump campaign's relationship with Russia.

House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy on Friday threatened to boot Adam Schiff from the House Intelligence Committee.

House Democrats last year voted to strip Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene from all her committee assignments after several news reports emerged showing the Georgia lawmaker voicing support for violence against Democrats.

"You cannot make this committee political, you cannot use it as a position of chairman to lie, and you should be focused on what the American people want you to be focused on around the world," he continued.

House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy on Friday said Republicans will remove Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff from the House Intelligence Committee if the GOP secures a majority in the November midterm elections.
Democrats also removed Rep. Paul Gosar, a Republican from Arizona, from his committee assignments after he posted an edited anime video showing him killing Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.

When asked to justify his reason for advocating for their removal, McCarthy said Democrats have removed Republican lawmakers from committees.
McCarthy, the top House Republican, said during a press conference that Schiff's presence and contributions politicized the committee.
McCarthy has previously vowed to kick other Democrats off their committee assignments if Republicans retake the House in November.
McCarthy, for example, has previously expressed support for booting Rep. Eric Swalwell off of the House Intelligence Committee.
"The Democrats have created a new thing where they're picking and choosing who can be on committees," McCarthy told Breitbart.
In response, McCarthy has identified several Democratic lawmakers he wants to be removed from their committee assignments.
If the House GOP wins a majority in the midterms, McCarthy said Schiff will no longer be part of the powerful panel.
